snippet: Mike Daisey’s new series of monologues, “All the Faces of the Moon,” will take place over 29 nights at the Public Theater.
abstract: Mike Daisey’s new series of monologues All the Faces of the Moon, which aims to tell secret history of New York, will take place over 29 nights at the Public Theater.

snippet: Mr. Icahn’s message to Apple was clear: it should buy back more stock and fast. It would be a smart, relatively effortless move, the author writes.
abstract: Mr. Icahn’s message to Apple was clear: it should buy back more stock and fast. It would be a smart, relatively effortless move, the author writes.
